Oath Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Iron Will<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is in effect, which increases enmity.
You can view the job gauge description at any time from the Actions & Traits menu.
Oath Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Oath Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays the current strength of a paladin's oath, which increases as auto-attacks are performed. A strong oath is required to execute several select actions such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Sheltron<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Cover<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 45), and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Intervention<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 62), and will grow weaker upon using them.<hex:02100103>Using certain actions will increase the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Oath Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Beast Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Defiance<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is in effect, which increases enmity.
Beast Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Beast Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays the current strength of a warrior's wrath. This animalistic rage is required to execute several select actions such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Inner Beast<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Steel Cyclone<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 45) and will grow weaker upon using them.<hex:02100103>Using certain actions will increase the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Beast Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Blood Gauge
This symbol indicates the defensive stance <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Grit<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is in effect, which increases enmity.
Darkside Gauge

This timer indicates the duration of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Darkside<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, which increases damage dealt. Using <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Flood of Darkness<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> or <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Edge of Darkness<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 40) grants <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Darkside<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Blood Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Blood Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays the amount of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Blackblood<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> a dark knight has accumulated. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Blackblood<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> can be consumed to execute actions such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Bloodspiller<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Quietus<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 64).<hex:02100103>Using certain actions will increase the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Blood Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Darkside Gauge

This symbol indicates that the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Dark Arts<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> effect has been granted. This occurs when the barrier applied by the action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>The Blackest Night<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> has absorbed the full amount of damage.<hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Flood of Darkness<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Edge of Darkness<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> can be performed by consuming <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Dark Arts<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> instead of MP while the effect is active.
Darkside Gauge
When executing <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Living Shadow<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, a second timer indicating its duration will appear.
Healing Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Healing Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays the current number of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Lilies<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> a white mage has accumulated. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Lilies<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> are accumulated as time passes while engaged in combat.<hex:02100103><hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Lilies<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> are consumed by using the actions <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Afflatus Solace<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Afflatus Rapture<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 76).
Healing Gauge

Performing actions that consume <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Lilies<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will also nourish the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Blood Lily<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. The <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Blood Lily<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will bloom after consuming three <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Lilies<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, allowing the execution of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Afflatus Misery<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Aetherflow Gauge

Using the action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Aetherflow<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> fills the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Aetherflow Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, which is required to use certain actions.
Faerie Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Faerie Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays the current amount of fae aether accumulated within a faerie. Fae aether is accumulated by using actions such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Lustrate<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Excogitation<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> in combat, depleting the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Aetherflow Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. Maintaining an <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Aetherpact<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> consumes fae aether.
Faerie Gauge

Using the action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Summon Seraph<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> replaces Eos with Seraph. The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Faerie Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will indicate how much time remains before she must return.
Arcana Gauge

Using the actions <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Astral Draw<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> or <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Umbral Draw<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will replace <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Play I<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Play II<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Play III<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> with their respective arcanum, which will be represented in the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Arcana Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Divination and Arcana Gauges
Chakra Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Chakra Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> indicates the number of chakra a monk currently has opened. Chakra are opened using actions such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Steeled Meditation<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, or by using certain weaponskills. Opening five allows for the execution of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Steel Peak<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Howling Fist<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 40).
Beast Chakra Gauge

Executing certain weaponskills will open <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Beast Chakra<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>─<hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Opo-opo Chakra<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Coeurl Chakra<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, or <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Raptor Chakra<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>─in accordance with the form normally required to execute them. After opening three, you will be able to execute one of several powerful actions. Three distinct <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Beast Chakra<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> allow the execution of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Flint Strike<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, three of the same allow the execution of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Elixir Field<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and two distinct chakra with a third repeating one allow the execution of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Celestial Revolution<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>It is also possible to open the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Lunar Nadi<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Solar Nadi<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> by executing <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Elixir Field<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Flint Strike<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> respectively. Opening three <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Beast Chakra<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and both nadi allows the execution of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Tornado Kick<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Lightning Gauge

The action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Brotherhood<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> grants the effect <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Meditative Brotherhood<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> to you and nearby party members, increasing the frequency with which you open chakra. Moreover, you can open up to ten chakra so long as you are under this effect.
Dragon Gauge

This timer indicates the duration of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Blood of the Dragon<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, which increases damage dealt. Using <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Geirskogul<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> grants <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Blood of the Dragon<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Dragon Gauge

Upon learning the trait <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Lance Mastery IV<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, the actions <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Raiden Thrust<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Draconian Fury<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> can be executed to sharpen the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Firstminds' Focus<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, up to a maximum of 2 units. Once their focus is fully sharpened, you can execute <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Wyrmwind Thrust<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Kazematoi

Using the action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Armor Crush<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> as part of a combo grants stacks of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Kazematoi<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, represented by this gauge. Up to five stacks can be stored, and are used to increase the potency of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Aeolian Edge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Ninki Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Ninki Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays the current amount of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Ninki<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> a ninja has accumulated. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Ninki<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> slowly builds inside a ninja's body when certain weaponskills are performed and can be used to execute special ninjutsu such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Hellfrog Medium<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Bhavacakra<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 68).
Sen Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Sen Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays which of the 3 <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Sen<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> effects─<hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Setsu<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (top), <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Getsu<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (left), and <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Ka<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (right)─are currently accumulated. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Sen<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is required to perform <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Iaijutsu<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, the number of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Sen<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> accumulated determining which weaponskill will be executed─1 for <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Higanbana<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, 2 for <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Tenka Goken<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and 3 for <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Midare Setsugekka<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Kenki Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Kenki Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> displays the current amount of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Kenki<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> a samurai has accumulated. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Kenki<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> slowly builds in a samurai's blade through the successful execution of weaponskills or <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Third Eye<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Kenki<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is required to execute special devastating attacks such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Hissatsu: Shinten<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Hissatsu: Gyoten<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 54), <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Hissatsu: Guren<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 70), and more.
Song Gauge

Singing <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Mage's Ballad<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will display the action's corresponding <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Song Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, indicating the effect's time remaining.<hex:02100103>If the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Repertoire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> effect is triggered while <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Mage's Ballad<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is being sung, the recast times for <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Bloodletter<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Rain of Death<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (learned at level 45) are reduced.

<hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>“詩心”<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>は<hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>「ベノムバイト/コースティックバイト」<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>、<hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>「ウィンドバイト/ストームバイト」<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>による継続ダメージの命中時に一定確率で発動します。戦歌を使い、詩心を付与させていくことで吟遊詩人の攻撃力を高めることができます。

Singing <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Army's Paeon<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will display the action's corresponding <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Song Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, indicating the effect's time remaining.<hex:02100103>If the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Repertoire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> effect is triggered while <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Army's Paeon<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is being sung, the bard is granted reduced weaponskill cast time and recast time, spell cast time and recast time, and auto-attack delay according to the number of stacks accumulated.

Singing the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Wanderer's Minuet<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will display the action's corresponding <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Song Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, indicating the effect's time remaining.<hex:02100103>If the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Repertoire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> effect is triggered while the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Wanderer's Minuet<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is being sung, the action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Pitch Perfect<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will become available. The potency of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Pitch Perfect<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> increases according to the number of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Repertoire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> stacks.
Soul Voice Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Soul Voice Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> increases in tandem with <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Repertoire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and is depleted when using the action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Apex Arrow<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>.
Heat Gauge

Performing certain weaponskills will increase the <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Heat Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and once it is high enough, the action <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Hypercharge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will become available. Using <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Hypercharge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> overheats your weapon and allows the use of <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Heat Blast<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 35) and <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Auto Crossbow<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 52).
Heat Gauge and Battery Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Battery Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> accumulates when certain actions are performed and allows the placement of a <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Rook Autoturret<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, which will attack your target. It also allows the deployment of an <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Automaton Queen<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (acquired at level 80) to fight alongside you.
Elemental Gauge

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Elemental Gauge<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> indicates whether you are under the influence of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Astral Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (after casting a <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> spell) or <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Umbral Ice<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> (after casting a <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Blizzard<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> spell). While under the influence of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Astral Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, all <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> spells will have increased potency, but require more MP to cast. While under the influence of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Umbral Ice<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, all <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Blizzard<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> spells will have no cost, and will recover MP upon striking a target. Furthermore, when maintaining stacks of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Astral Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> or <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Umbral Ice<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, a spell of the opposite element can be cast at no cost but will deal reduced damage.

Coming under the influence of <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Astral Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> or <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Umbral Ice<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> will grant <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Enochian<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>, and set the lower-right corner of the gauge aglow, indicating its effect is active. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Enochian<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> increases the potency of magic attacks, as well as unlocks powerful spells such as <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Blizzard IV<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>. <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Enochian<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> fades when <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Astral Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> or <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Umbral Ice<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> expires.

Casting <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Freeze<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> or <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Blizzard IV<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> grants 3 <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Umbral Hearts<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> which are represented by the arrows in the gauge's lower-left corner. An <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Umbral Heart<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> is consumed each time a <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> spell is cast, nullifying the MP cost increase applied by the <hex:024804F201FA03><hex:024904F201FB03>Astral Fire<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> status.

The <hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Enochian<hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> bar will fill every 30 seconds the status is maintained.
